content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question:

a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in life expectancy in Nigeria. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how the democratic transition in Nigeria affected life expectancy between 1990 and 2017.

(c) Explain why life expectancy in Nigeria differs from life expectancy in China.

frqParts.text:
Respond to all parts of the question:

a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in life expectancy in Nigeria. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how the democratic transition in Nigeria affected life expectancy between 1990 and 2017.

(c) Explain why life expectancy in Nigeria differs from life expectancy in China.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
